desc: We have an exquisite, vast range of decorative lighting products to cater to your every need and mood. Luxury made affordable and accessible for everyone. Our extensive range of designs include pendants, table lamps, floor lamps, wall lights, and modern chandeliers lights.

layout.text: At Vantra, we don’t just see light. We bear the warmth that the ceiling emanates, we hear the ripples across the walls and we bask in the luminescence of drifting gleams.
